author: sadri 777
text: 'Good latte and mini muffins gluetin free'

author: Cherie Calingasan
text: 'ok'

author: Cherie Hankin
text: 'fine'

author: Liz Cognat
text: 'Let me start off by saying my daughter ordered a cake in April that was absolutely delicious!  This is why I decided to order from them for my nieces bridal shower in September. Unfortunately this cake was dry and stale. I was so disappointed and embarrassed. I called the store the following day but the manager was not there. I told the person I spoke with what happened and she apologized and told me she would have the manager call me back. It‚Äôs 24 hrs later and no phone call. Very poor customer service. Needless to say I will not be returning.'

author: Star Bellemie
text: 'Excellent! The best cannolis in the world'

author: Nikhil Saxena
text: 'I don\'t know if the people that work here know what they\'re doing. I placed an order here for a very special birthday over the phone simply for two yellow cakes with chocolate frosting. The lady on the phone jotted down two "vanilla" cakes with chocolate frosting. When I followed up that I specifically want yellow cakes
column6: "Those are our vanilla cakes." I expected after my clarification of yellow cake
column7: and the affirmation from the lady over the phone
column8: that the bakery would provide me with yellow cakes. I then picked up the cakes a week later. However
column9: only during the birthday party once we cut the cake did we notice that they made us white cakes. This honestly spoiled the birthday party as yellow cake is the birthday girl\'s favorite. A professional bakery should understand the difference between white cake and yellow cake especially after I made it clear and repeated I wanted yellow cakes. This is why I\'m not confident the employees here know what they\'re doing. To top it off
column10: the cakes were dry and lacked any flavor. Very disappointing from a supposedly professional bakery that they couldn\'t manage to complete a very simple cake order
column11: and I would recommend people use another bakery if they want the cakes they actually ordered...'

author: Karishma Ahluwalia
text: 'Absolutely loved the delicious cakes we ordered for our sons 1st birthday !!  Looked beautiful and tasted super delicious üíñüíñ thank you guys'

author: Pete
text: 'Nice little bake shop place with cupcakes and cookies'

author: Lady Ace
text: 'I came here after dinner as I was craving something sweet. I love eating something sweet and I am always in the mood for cake. The quaint bakeshop is located near a park. Due to COVID
column5: they are limiting the amount of people in the store.\n\nI ordered a Red Velvet ($3.75) and a Fluffernutter ($3.75). The cupcakes were tasty but
column6: I felt that they were a bit small to be "regular" sized. Personally
column7: I thought the tasty and presentation was just okay. I didn\'t see anything that made them noteworthy to visit again.\n\nThe bakery had tons of interesting flavors but
column8: I am not sure I would return. Maybe if I was in the area again. The one thing I didn\'t like is that the cupcakes were placed in a paper bag. I had to be very careful on transporting home my goodies. The customer service was okay. The person didn\'t really seem into being there one way or another. I was just another fly on the wall for all they cared.'

author: Hip Hop Junky Radio Show
text: 'Not impressed. There are 2 other cup cake joints that are same price range but tastes better. Sweet is the spot that I would go as a last cupcake option'

author: Liza Duval
text: "We've been getting cakes and cupcakes at Sweet since the day they opened
column5: and will never go anywhere else! Angela and her team are amazing and the cakes are unique and delicious... Also best hot chocolate in hoboken! Definitely highly recommend Sweet!"

author: Soha Chokshi
text: 'The cupcakes were great! This is probably the best place for cupcakes that we‚Äôve ever been too! (the coffee was awesome too)'

author: Jojo Gian24
text: 'Hard flavorless cupcakes and cake. Not sure why the 5.0 reviews
column5: only place in Hoboken for cupcakes

author: Rachael Genovese
text: 'Ordered a Pawl Patrol cake for my daughter‚Äôs 3rd birthday. Came out adorable and the cake was delicious üòã'

author: Jessica Nisler
text: 'Ordered a delicious red velvet cake for my friends birthday! So good

author: LYVICK PEREZ
text: 'These desserts are incredibly delicious. They have mini cupcakes as well as regular sized ones.  Worth the walk in the freezing @ss cold.'

author: Rich Slaby
text: "Don't miss their cookie dough. Super easy to make amazing fresh cookies at home in a few minutes."

author: Regina Wilson
text: 'Sweet is great! Lovely staff
column5: even better desserts! A neighborhood staple.'

author: G. Lee
text: 'Wrong open hours in google map. The google map says open now (8:38am). It has to be updated. Cupcakes are great that‚Äôs why I walk this far... üò≠'

author: Randall Bruins
text: 'We ordered two 6‚Äù birthday cakes - they were ready on time and just fabulous!'

author: Carla Reagan
text: 'OMG -best
column5: very moist cupcakes I‚Äôve ever had in my life! I think about them while sleeping! Yesterday tried chocolate with peanut butter frosting to delicious to describe!'

author: Matt Schwalb
text: 'Had a cake made for my wife\'s birthday. My instruction
column5: "make it look pretty" Angela took my vague instruction and hit it out of the park. It\'s the little things during the pandemic. Thanks Angela'

author: Kelly Mayer
text: 'Delicious cupcakes! Thank you for staying open during this pandemic and making my day much sweeter!'

author: Brent Kottner
text: 'We are so excited to have had a cake made for the reveal of our daughters gender by Sweet! She delivered at an extremely high level! The cake was beautiful

author: LOVE
text: 'Consistently great cupcakes. They are fantastic.'

author: Grant Williams
text: "Not very inviting. I stood there at the counter for awhile. I made eye contact with the younger girl and she quickly looked away and went off to look busy. So I ended up leaving never trying anything so I can't even judge the produce... I'm sure if I was in my scrubs from work and parked my testla outside I would have gotten service quick but because I was in shorts and walked up I was ignored."

author: Sean Johnson
text: 'Love stopping here when the kids (or I) earn a treat. Mini cupcakes are great for not over hyping the kiddos. Hot chocolate is a w e s o m e. Great location by the park.'

author: Sabrina C
text: "Cute decor and easy to find! Plenty of sweets to choose from for immediate satisfaction. Staff was knowledgeable and gave good recommendations
column5: although they could benefit from a shot of espresso. Ordering a cake seems simple enough with letting them know what you want and they take care of the rest with about a week's notice. Cant wait!"

author: Joe Brendel
text: 'Sweet is THE BEST in Hoboken. We stop in usually once a week for cupcakes to give as gifts or have ourselves. I just had 9-minis for my birthday... oops. They make insane theme cakes too

author: Donwan Harrell
text: 'Best cupcakes in NJ'

author: Derrick Mitcham
text: "Some of the best cupcakes you'll ever try! Do yourself a favor and pay Sweet Bakery a visit."

author: Jose Batlle
text: 'Best cupcakes.'

author: Sophie Raven
text: "Delicious cupcakes! Icing can be a bit too sweet for some cupcakes like red velvet but they're still very good. Will be back!"

author: KSYogaFit
text: 'This is the best place for cup cakes and coffee!'

author: Diane Johnson
text: 'Sweet makes the best cupcakes.  I have loved every flavor I have tried.  I also tried the scones on a whim and they were also amazing.'

author: Vidhi Mehrotra
text: 'The cake was designed exactly the way I wanted. Super moist and delicious. Thank you team Sweet!!!'

author: Pearl Stars
text: 'My favorite cupcake place. This place is amazing and the location is super romantic (just across local library and park).'

author: Bridget Bassett
text: 'Fantastic bakery! Staff & owner are so kind and helpful! You MUST try the strawberry chocolate chip muffins! She only makes a certain time of year.'

author: Stephen Lagano
text: 'Best coffee in hoboken'

author: Mimi Marcus
text: "My go to spot for mini cupcakes. Always a crowd pleaser at work. There's a flavor for everyone. :)"

author: Nathan Turoff
text: 'Decent cupcakes.  Mommy Central.'

author: Michael Jacobs
text: 'Cupcakes were delicious!!'

author: Eric Lampi
text: "Really nice selection of cupcakes. Very consistent product
column5: moist cake and the icing isn't super sweet."

author: Valentina Gu
text: "Probably some of the best mini cupcakes around. I like that there are changing flavors every season and delicious staples that I'm obsessed with. Great way to fix a sweet tooth without over doing oneself on dessert!"

author: Andrew G
text: 'Solid cupcakes
column5: good coffee and friendly service in a bright and cozy corner spot. The red velvet cupcakes are particularly good.'

author: Mark Lerner
text: 'Excellent coffee to go. Much better than the chains.'

author: Christina Assuncao
text: "This is the best place to stop for a coffee and a cupcake! Sweet has catered at least 5 events for us with sweets of all kinds and never disappoints. Also try the rice crispy treats- they are ridiculously good. The staff is so friendly I really can't say enough about this shop. They are simply the best at what they do."

author: Daniel Lin
text: 'my go to place for picking up sweets for parties / events.  the mini cupcakes are perfect for kids & just that little taste to try without feeling guilty.  they also serve coffee from La Colombe which has the best coffee ever.  great location.  awesome staff!'

author: nick piergallini
text: "Thank you Sweet! I have literally given you hundreds of dollars of business and today after I called and spoke to someone who told me that I would be OK if I came 5 minutes after you closed
column5: you wouldn't open your door AT 6:05pm.  I'm so glad as a bakery you cannot make a 5 minute exception for a customer who is loyal enough to race to get to your shop as you close after calling ahead and making sure it would be OK to do that.\n\nI will NEVER give you my business again. Very rude customer service after I have been so loyal. I'm unbelievably disappointed a business could be so rude."

author: Amanda Rich
text: 'I am a cupcake snob and this place makes the best cupcakes that I\'ve ever had. Once you try these you will forget all about Carlos\'
column9: and all those other "designer" cupcakes places. The cake is super moist and packed with flavor. The icing is sweet
column10: but not overboard. I stumbled upon this place just walking around the neighborhood and will definitely be back soon.'

author: Pat Coleman
text: 'Really good cup cakes

author: Kunal Kapur
text: 'Coffee snobs welcome! Fantastically decorated (and great tasting) cakes! Love their scones and rice Krispy fudge bars...Hoboken residents : we are lucky!'

author: Mike Insignares
text: 'Best bakery in Hoboken!'

author: J Y
text: "Agree with the positive reviews. Occasional mixed service but no one seems to have noted that they are an amazing coffee place. Gourmet La Colombe beans by baristas who know what they're doing."

author: Chad Rzeznik
text: "Went in for the first time today and asked what their signature items were.  Was recommended and got a mini Red Velvet cupcake and a chocolate cupcake topped with chocolate chip cheesecake.  Both excellent and the small coffee I got same with steamed milk which added a nice touch.\n\nNice place that I'd definitely recommend"

author: Ruchi Patel
text: "I was walking by and just randomly decided to stop by and grab some cupcakes on my way up to Stevens. They were by far the best cupcakes I've eaten thus far. This is compared to Magnolia Bakery in NYC and Starbucks cupcakes. Crumbs cupcakes are good as well
column5: but fancier and more expensive. (also larger) But these are absolutely excellent. Red velvet is a must!"
